DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of treatment with SYR-472 in diabetic patients.
DOC.criteria: 1. The participant is an outpatient. 2. The participant signs and dates a written, informed consent form and any required privacy authorization prior to the initiation of any study procedures. 1.
